sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GIMP package contains gimp, gimp-remote and gimptool.

sect3.title: gimp
sect3.para: gimp is an image manipulation program. It works with a variety of image formats and provides a large selection of tools.

sect3.title: gimp-remote
sect3.para: gimp-remote is a small utility that tells a running GIMP to open a local or remote image file.

sect3.title: gimptool
sect3.para: gimptool is a tool that can build plug-ins or scripts and install them if they are distributed in one source file. gimptool can also be used by programs that need to know what libraries and include-paths GIMP was compiled with.
